messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Carry on
messages.msgSnippet: You have my complete sympathy for your hubby.  I went through that a year ago.  Yuck!!!!  Ouch!!!!  Scream!!!! Lynda ... be ... and
messages.messageBody:
You have my complete sympathy for your hubby. I went through that a year
ago. Yuck!!!! Ouch!!!! Scream!!!!

Lynda

----------
> From: braunville@...
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Carry on
> Date: Friday, September 29, 2000 2:18 AM
>
> You'll have to carry on without me for a while. (Not that I expect I'll
be
> missed <bg>). DH is fighting a losing battle with killer kidney stones.

> I'll be a bit busy for the next few days spending time at the hospital
and
> such.
>
> Don't have too much fun without me! I'll catch up on the web when I can.
>
> Eiraul

messages.subject: Carry on
messages.msgSnippet: You ll have to carry on without me for a while.  (Not that I expect I ll be missed ).  DH is fighting a losing battle with killer kidney stones. I ll be a
messages.messageBody:
You'll have to carry on without me for a while. (Not that I expect I'll be
missed <bg>). DH is fighting a losing battle with killer kidney stones.
I'll be a bit busy for the next few days spending time at the hospital and
such.

Don't have too much fun without me! I'll catch up on the web when I can.

Eiraul
